ï»¿OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS ADMINISTRATION ARRANGEMENT With reference to the General Arrangement between the Netherlands Minister for European Affairs and International Cooperation (formerly the Minister for Development Cooperation) (the "Minister") and the International Bark for Reconstruction and Development ("IBRD") and the Interational Development Association ("IDA") (collectively referred to as the "Bank") dated May -4, 2003. The Minister has decided to support the Kosovo Clean-up and Land Reclamation Project with the Minister's internal identification rumber 23651 and the Bank's trust fund number TF071961 by making available a grant (the "Grant") in the amount of Euros Eight Hundred Ninety Thotsand (,6890,000.00). The Grant will be used for the following expenses: (Indicative Budget, in Euro) Con.ultants' Services E339,606 Civi' Works E148,400 Goods C350,000 Operating Costs E 16,000 Training E 0 Admnistration Fees C 35,994 (Staf Costs - with Indirect Costs) The terms of the General Arrangement will apply to the Grant made available under this Administration Arrangement, except as otherwise provided herein. The Minister will deposit the Grant with the Bank, upon request from the Bank, into such bank acccunt designated by the Bank. The payment of Euros E890,000 will be made upon receipt of the signed and dated Administration Arrangement and a payment request. The Grant may be used to finance expenditures for the Project commencing on October 11, 2012 and ending on June 30, 2013.
ï»¿2 The offices responsible for coordination of all matters related to this Administration Arrat. 2ement are: For ti- Bank: Katelijn van den Berg Senicr Environmental Economist Sustainable Development Department Europe and Central Asia region Email: kvandenberggworldbank.org; tel: +1 202 4585743 For the- Minister: Ms. Irama Kay, Deputy Head of Mission Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands Pristina, Kosovo, Emma.kaygminbuza.nl; tel +377 44 972 571 Signe1 in duplicate, FOR '[HE MINISTER FOR EUROPEAN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL COOPERATION Steph Raes Minister ic) Royal Netherlands Embassy Washington, DC October .1.6, 2012 FOR THE INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT AND FOR THE INTERNATIONAL DEVFLOPMENT ASSOCIATION Jane Armitage Country Director and Regional Coordinator for Southeast Europe Europe and Central Asia Region October .i., 2012
